body_html:
@tanzhenyu : Global collections in general aren't used with eager execution and that won't change going forward.

That said, why do we need to use them at all? Can we use Model.variables to get all the variables instead of using the collection?
body_text:
@tanzhenyu : Global collections in general aren't used with eager execution and that won't change going forward.
That said, why do we need to use them at all? Can we use Model.variables to get all the variables instead of using the collection?
body:
@tanzhenyu : Global collections in general aren't used with eager execution and that won't change going forward.

That said, why do we need to use them at all? Can we use `Model.variables` to get all the variables instead of using the collection?
